creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: abstract image of woman's head formed with white arcing lines separating planes of color--peach, red, black, grey and white; shin hanga (bijin-ga)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with gofun
title: Spanish Girl
